医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
卵巢癌的关键因素可能对多囊卵巢综合症有影响研究人员探索了 BBOX1-AS1 和 microRNA-19b 在多囊卵巢综合征中的参与和表达变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Key-player-in-ovarian-cancer-may-have-implications-for-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Key-player-in-ovarian-cancer-may-have-implications-for-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5421c4c4-966e-4399-b680-e87db04d3c68 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 11:59:00 -0400 Key player in ovarian cancer may have implications for PCOS
抑制思想的训练可以改善心理健康吗？学习挑战百年智慧研究人员描述了思想抑制对记忆、情感、积极或消极心理健康指数的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Can-training-to-suppress-thoughts-improve-mental-health-Study-challenges- century-old-wisdom.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Can-training-to-suppress-thoughts-improve-mental-health-Study-challenges- century-old-wisdom.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=276d2c25-56e0-45f9-9bcb-4c93316565f8 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 11:48:00 -0400 Can training to suppress thoughts improve mental health? Study challenges century-old wisdom
研究探讨了瑜伽疗法作为心力衰竭补充治疗的益处先前的研究表明，瑜伽疗法和生活方式的改变可以改善心力衰竭患者的生活质量并增强他们的心血管功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Study-examines-the-benefit-of-adding-yoga-therapy-as-a-complementary-treatment-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Study-examines-the-benefit-of-adding-yoga-therapy-as-a-complementary-treatment-for-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1a9a4a5-7d8f-4ef9-af53-43338a783c58 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 11:47:00 -0400 Study examines the benefit of adding yoga therapy as a complementary treatment for heart failure
干细胞移植为多发性硬化症患者带来希望《神经病学、神经外科与精神病学杂志》在线发表的研究发现，从人自己的骨髓或血液中采集的干细胞可以安全地减缓最常见形式的自身免疫性疾病、多发性硬化症或多发性硬化症的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Stem-cell-transplant-offers-hope-for-病人-with-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Stem-cell-transplant-offers-hope-for-病人-with-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eae67c55-a1e7-4f05-ac0e-f98b2a5bdd31 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 11:44:53 -0400 Stem cell transplant offers hope for patients with multiple sclerosis
研究发现，生活成本危机可能会扭转预期寿命的增长开放获取期刊《BMJ 公共卫生》上发表的一项模型研究表明，生活成本危机将缩短苏格兰和英国其他地区社会最富有和最贫穷阶层之间的财富和健康差距，并缩短人们的寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Cost-of-living-crisis-threatens-to-reverse-gains-in-life-expectancy-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Cost-of-living-crisis-threatens-to-reverse-gains-in-life-expectancy-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=795ddb32-a488-4f86-aece-f8958b0a3c20 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 11:43:23 -0400
UKHSA 同意在英国生产救生疫苗的协议英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA) 已同意，如果未来宣布流感大流行，将在英国生产数百万份拯救生命的疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/UKHSA-agrees-a-deal-to- Produce-life- saving-vaccines-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/UKHSA-agrees-a-deal-to- Produce-life- saving-vaccines-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e7dba88-b32a-4a2d-9ea2-f32fcbae95e0 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 07:31:57 -0400 UKHSA agrees a deal to produce life-saving vaccines in the UK
青少年出生率长达数十年的下降趋势正在放缓，倡导者担心逆转即将到来西塞莉·威尔逊 (Cicely Wilson) 辞去哺乳顾问、导乐师和儿童保育专家的日常工作后，她的工作并没有结束。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/A-decades-long-drop-in-teen-births-is-slowing-and-advocates-worry-a-reversal-is-coming.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/A-decades-long-drop-in-teen-births-is-slowing-and-advocates-worry-a-reversal-is-coming.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a6fb08d-0dbb-48c9-a565-12e580a09ff5 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 07:14:04 -0400 A decades-long drop in teen births is slowing, and advocates worry a reversal is coming
